name: Football kick off – World football championship and champions league
name_original: Football kick off – World football championship and champions league
description:
Hey friends!! A “Real Soccer Game for Real Champions” because it is the “Champion’s Choice”. Here we have an amazing interactive soccer game. Tap the white balls to score goals and avoid tapping the colored balls so as to not lose your lives. Don’t tap on the bomb as it ends the game immediately. So be smart and focused and get ready for an extremely joyous ride. So download it now and get subscribed to unlimited fun !!!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
•Tap the white balls to hit the goals
•Don’t lose your lifelines by tapping on the colored balls
•Don’t explode the bomb as it ends the game immediately
•Score maximum goals and share it with your friends and family

FEATURES:
======================
•Easy tap game play.
•Kids friendly content
•No violence, horror, sex or nudity
•Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
•Sharing on Facebook with friends & family
•No monsters, dragons, aliens or clans
•No hospitals, doctors, dentists or sickness
•Suitable for the whole family
•Cool BG music and HD graphics

=== YOU ARE SWEET ===
Your support by good reviews and ratings would help us to always provide you with free and cool apps and games; so don’t hesitate to give good ratings and reviews. We always welcome your feedback and any cool ideas about our games, to improve continuously; you might be willing to share at playinkstudio@gmail.com

=== JOIN US ON FACEBOOK ===
There are some exclusive news, updates and secret tips and tricks for you about our games at facebook,

OK then enjoy & Good Bye!
